line_1: Shall smile, and pay them all the Vast Arrear.
line_2: When Nigard Nature shall their Nation hear,

line_1: That him perforce constrain'd to wend arrear.
line_2: He fiercely prick'd, and couch'd his vengeful spear;

line_1: That him perforce constrain'd to wend arrear.
line_2: Who, much abash'd at such rebuke severe,

line_1: That him perforce constrain'd to wend arrear.
